/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a winding road that cuts through a lush green forest. The road, a two-lane highway, is flanked by trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up towards the towering trees and the expansive sky. The image appears to have been taken from a drone or a high vantage point, providing a panoramic view of the landscape. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky. The winding road adds a sense of depth and movement to the image.
